discussion_comments.comment_body: should we maybe try a modifier pattern (I think I've done this elsewhere?)... something like `--title-color--header`?
I think that is a good idea.

Could we shorten this parent class name? What's "education" doing in there? I'd rather have something like `empty-state` and if we must differentiate use modifiers like `empty_state --topic-filer`. That way the classnames of child items remains more concise.
